member.summary: An implementation of that traverses readable properties, collections and dictionaries.

member.summary: Defines a strategy that walks through an object graph.

member.summary: Traverses the specified object graph.
member.param: The static type of the graph.
An that is to be notified during the traversal.

member.name: T:YamlDotNet.RepresentationModel.Serialization.IObjectGraphVisitor
member.summary: Defined the interface of a type that can be notified during an object graph traversal.

member.name: M:YamlDotNet.RepresentationModel.Serialization.IObjectGraphVisitor.Enter(System.Object,System.Type)
member.summary: Indicates whether the specified value should be entered. This allows the visitor to override the handling of a particular object or type.
member.param: The value that is about to be entered.
member.returns: If the value is to be entered, returns true; otherwise returns false;

member.name: M:YamlDotNet.RepresentationModel.Serialization.IObjectGraphVisitor.EnterMapping(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Type)
member.summary: Indicates whether the specified mapping should be entered. This allows the visitor to override the handling of a particular pair.
member.param: The key of the mapping that is about to be entered.
The value of the mapping that is about to be entered.
member.returns: If the mapping is to be entered, returns true; otherwise returns false;

member.name: M:YamlDotNet.RepresentationModel.Serialization.IObjectGraphVisitor.EnterMapping(YamlDotNet.RepresentationModel.Serialization.IPropertyDescriptor,System.Object)
member.summary: Indicates whether the specified mapping should be entered. This allows the visitor to override the handling of a particular pair. This overload should be invoked when the mapping is produced by an object's property.
member.param: The value of the mapping that is about to be entered.
member.returns: If the mapping is to be entered, returns true; otherwise returns false;

member.name: M:YamlDotNet.RepresentationModel.Serialization.IObjectGraphVisitor.VisitScalar(System.Object,System.Type)
member.summary: Notifies the visitor that a scalar value has been encountered.

member.name: M:YamlDotNet.RepresentationModel.Serialization.IObjectGraphVisitor.VisitMappingStart(System.Object,System.Type,System.Type,System.Type)
member.summary: Notifies the visitor that the traversal of a mapping is about to begin.
member.param: The value that corresponds to the mapping.
The static type of the mapping.
The static type of the keys of the mapping.
The static type of the values of the mapping.

member.name: M:YamlDotNet.RepresentationModel.Serialization.IObjectGraphVisitor.VisitMappingEnd(System.Object,System.Type)
member.summary: Notifies the visitor that the traversal of a mapping has ended.
member.param: The value that corresponds to the mapping.
The static type of the mapping.

member.name: M:YamlDotNet.RepresentationModel.Serialization.IObjectGraphVisitor.VisitSequenceStart(System.Object,System.Type,System.Type)
member.summary: Notifies the visitor that the traversal of a sequence is about to begin.
member.param: The value that corresponds to the sequence.
The static type of the mapping.
The static type of the elements of the sequence.

member.name: M:YamlDotNet.RepresentationModel.Serialization.IObjectGraphVisitor.VisitSequenceEnd(System.Object,System.Type)
member.summary: Notifies the visitor that the traversal of a sequence has ended.
member.param: The value that corresponds to the sequence.
The static type of the mapping.

member.name: T:YamlDotNet.RepresentationModel.Serialization.NamingConventions.CamelCaseNamingConvention
member.summary: Convert the string with underscores (this_is_a_test) or hyphens (this-is-a-test) to camel case (thisIsATest). Camel case is the same as Pascal case, except the first letter is lowercase.

member.name: T:YamlDotNet.RepresentationModel.Serialization.SerializationOptions
member.summary: Options that control the serialization process.

member.name: F:YamlDotNet.RepresentationModel.Serialization.SerializationOptions.None
member.summary: Serializes using the default options

member.name: F:YamlDotNet.RepresentationModel.Serialization.SerializationOptions.Roundtrip
member.summary: Ensures that it will be possible to deserialize the serialized objects.

member.name: F:YamlDotNet.RepresentationModel.Serialization.SerializationOptions.DisableAliases
member.summary: If this flag is specified, if the same object appears more than once in the serialization graph, it will be serialized each time instead of just once.
member.remarks: If the serialization graph contains circular references and this flag is set, a will be thrown. If this flag is not set, there is a performance penalty because the entire object graph must be walked twice.

member.name: F:YamlDotNet.RepresentationModel.Serialization.SerializationOptions.EmitDefaults
member.summary: Forces every value to be serialized, even if it is the default value for that type.

member.name: F:YamlDotNet.RepresentationModel.Serialization.SerializationOptions.JsonCompatible
member.summary: Ensures that the result of the serialization is valid JSON.
